00023 #include "birdseed-dev/Prior.h"

00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace birdseed::dev;
00035 
00036 
00037 Prior::Prior(const char *s)
00038 {
00039   unsigned int temp;
00040   int ret = sscanf(s, "%lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %u",
00041                    &m_mean[0], &m_mean[1], &m_covarMatrix[0][0], &m_covarMatrix[1][0], &m_covarMatrix[1][1], &temp);
00042   if (ret != 6) {
00043     throw BroadException("Error parsing prior", __FILE__, __LINE__, s);
00044   }
00045   m_covarMatrix[0][1] = m_covarMatrix[1][0];
00046   m_numObservations = temp;
00047 }
00048 
00049 std::string Prior::tostring(std::string sep) const
00050 {
00051   std::stringstream strm;
00052   strm << m_mean[0] << sep << m_mean[1] << sep
00053   << m_covarMatrix[0][0] << sep << m_covarMatrix[1][0] << sep << m_covarMatrix[1][1] << sep
00054   << m_numObservations;
00055   return strm.str();
00056 }
00057 
00058 Priors::Priors(uint32_t numPriors):
00059     numPriors(numPriors)
00060 {
00061   assert(numPriors == 2 || numPriors == 3);
00062   memset(thePriors, '\0', sizeof(thePriors));
00063 }
00064 
00065 size_t Priors::numObservations() const
00066 {
00067   size_t tot = 0;
00068   for (size_t i = 0; i < numPriors; ++i) {
00069     tot += thePriors[i].m_numObservations;
00070   }
00071   return tot;
00072 }
00073 
00074 const Prior & Priors::getDiploidPrior(DiploidIndex i) const
00075 {
00076   assert(isDiploid());
00077   return thePriors[i];
00078 }
00079 
00080 const Prior & Priors::getHaploidPrior(HaploidIndex i) const
00081 {
00082   assert(!isDiploid());
00083   return thePriors[i];
00084 }
00085 
00086 const Prior & Priors::getAPrior() const
00087 {
00088   if (isDiploid()) {
00089     return getDiploidPrior(AA_INDEX);
00090   } else return getHaploidPrior(A_INDEX);
00091 }
00092 
00093 const Prior & Priors::getBPrior() const
00094 {
00095   if (isDiploid()) {
00096     return getDiploidPrior(BB_INDEX);
00097   } else return getHaploidPrior(B_INDEX);
00098 }
00099 
00100 const Prior & Priors::getPrior(size_t i) const
00101 {
00102   assert(i < (sizeof(thePriors) / sizeof(thePriors[0])));
00103   return thePriors[i];
00104 }
00105 
00106 Prior & Priors::getPrior(size_t i)
00107 {
00108   assert(i < (sizeof(thePriors) / sizeof(thePriors[0])));
00109   return thePriors[i];
00110 }
00111 
00112 Prior & Priors::getDiploidPrior(DiploidIndex i)
00113 {
00114   assert(isDiploid());
00115   return thePriors[i];
00116 }
00117 
00118 Prior &Priors::getHaploidPrior(HaploidIndex i)
00119 {
00120   assert(!isDiploid());
00121   assert(i < (sizeof(thePriors) / sizeof(thePriors[0])));
00122   return thePriors[i];
00123 }
00124 
00125 void Priors::setPrior(const Prior &prior, size_t i)
00126 {
00127   assert(i < (sizeof(thePriors) / sizeof(thePriors[0])));
00128   thePriors[i] = prior;
00129 }
00130 void Priors::setNumPriors(size_t num)
00131 {
00132   numPriors = num;
00133 }
